headline: Evergy Schedules Conference Call to Discuss 4th Quarter Results
summary: KANSAS CITY, Mo., February 06, 2025--Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ: EVRG) announced today it will release its 2024 fourth quarter earnings Thursday, February 27, 2025, before market open. The company plans to host its quarterly conference call and audio webcast to discuss the results Thursday, February 27, 2025.
